trans-unit.source: Supports a simple iteration over a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 支援簡單反覆處理<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators provide read-only access to the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值會提供唯讀存取集合中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A>也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>前進的第一個元素之前讀取<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A>值集合的列舉值</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class inherits from the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類別繼承自<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: For more information about enumerating over a collection, see the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需在集合上列舉的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>主題。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的項目中<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator> does not move the position of the enumerator and consecutive calls to Current return the same object until either <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator>無法移動列舉值位置，而且目前的連續呼叫會傳回相同的物件直到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的項目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值位於集合或最後一個項目之後的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Advances the enumerator to the next element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將列舉值前移至下一個項目，在<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method advances the enumerator to the next element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將列舉值前移至集合中的下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: This class inherits from the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類別繼承自<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: For more information about enumerating over a collection, see the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需在集合上列舉的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>主題。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果列舉值成功前移至下一個元素;，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果列舉值已跳過集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立列舉值之後，已修改集合。

trans-unit.source: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定列舉值至它的初始位置，這是中的第一個項目之前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or Reset throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉程式會永久失效，並在下一個呼叫或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>重設會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立列舉值之後，已修改集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object from a collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合取得的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator> does not move the position of the enumerator and consecutive calls to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A> return the same object until either <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator>不會移動的列舉值和連續呼叫位置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A>傳回相同的物件直到<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的項目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ExtensionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值位於集合或最後一個項目之後的第一個項目之前。
